title: House for rent $995
posting_body: Includes A/C heat stove refrigerator washer dryer.
To move in requires first months rent of $995 plus security payment of $1500 and $300 utility payment pays electric gas water and trash pickup.
Total monthly payment is $1295 includes all utilities payment made to landlord monthly.
Large front yard quiet safe neighborhood walking distance to party store and restaurants.
Garage is not for rent garage not included.
